bully.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who uses their strength or power to frighten or hurt someone who is weaker
bully.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to threaten to hurt someone or frighten them, especially someone smaller or weaker
bully.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to put pressure on someone in order to make them do what you want
